statements: SELECT * FROM data_pipeline;
SELECT id, source_name, timestamp FROM data_pipeline WHERE data_type = 'CSV';
SELECT source_id, data_type FROM data_pipeline WHERE loaded_flag = TRUE;
SELECT source_name, transformed_data FROM data_pipeline ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_id, source_name, data_type, timestamp, transformed_data FROM data_pipeline WHERE source_id = 100;
SELECT id, source_id, source_name, timestamp, loaded_flag FROM data_pipeline;
SELECT * FROM data_pipeline WHERE source_id = 123 AND data_type='csv' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM data_pipeline GROUP BY source_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY record_count DESC;
SELECT id, source_id, source_name, loaded_flag FROM data_pipeline WHERE source_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND transformed_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY source_id, timestamp;
SELECT source_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM data_pipeline GROUP BY source_id ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM pipelines;
SELECT source, destination FROM pipelines;
SELECT destination, etl_process FROM pipelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT source_name, source_connection FROM data_sources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pipelines WHERE etl_process = 'Data Transformation';
SELECT source, destination, etl_process FROM pipelines WHERE source = 'Sales Data' ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API' AND source_connection LIKE '%https%';
SELECT id, source_name, source_type, source_connection FROM data_sources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT destination, etl_process FROM pipelines WHERE source = 'Marketing Data' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_sources
SELECT id, source_name FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT id, source_name, connection_details FROM data_sources WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM data_transformations
SELECT transformation_name, transformation_script FROM data_transformations
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT id, source_name FROM data_sources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_transformations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM data_load WHERE load_query IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ETL_Stage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source, data FROM Data_Extract WHERE extract_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, transform_date, transformed_data FROM Data_Transform ORDER BY transform_date DESC;
SELECT source, load_date FROM Data_Load WHERE destination = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, source, data, created_at FROM ETL_Stage WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ETL_Stage;
SELECT id, source, data -> 'key' AS key_data, created_at FROM ETL_Stage WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source, transform_date FROM Data_Transform ORDER BY transform_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT destination, loaded_data -> 'attribute' AS attribute_data, load_date FROM Data_Load WHERE destination = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, source, extract_date FROM Data_Extract WHERE extract_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM source_data_table;
SELECT source_name, data_type, data_value FROM source_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, loaded_data, load_status FROM load_data_table WHERE load_status = 'success';
SELECT pipeline_name, source_table_name, transform_table_name, load_table_name FROM pipeline_metadata_table;
SELECT * FROM transform_data_table WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, source_name, data_type, data_value FROM source_data_table WHERE data_type = 'string' ORDER BY data_value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transform_data_table WHERE transformed_data->>'status' = 'completed' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, loaded_data, load_status FROM load_data_table WHERE load_status = 'failed' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, log_message FROM pipeline_logs_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pipeline_name, source_table_name, load_table_name FROM pipeline_metadata_table WHERE transform_table_name = 'transformed_data_table' ORDER BY id DESC;
